entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
